showDescription.name: Show Estimates
showDescription.hint: Show estimates to the selected users.

stateNames.name: Stages
stateNames.hint:
An array of descriptions shown to players, arranged from worst to best possible health.
The amount of possible descriptions is not limited, the module will adjust the health percentage to show them proportionally to the amount.
If there is a need for one description to cover a higher range of health than others simply copy it several times.

deathState.name: Death State on Condition
deathState.hint: Show token as dead when it's been affected by any condition that uses the icon set on the Death Marker setting. Works independently from the macro.

deathStateName.name: Death State Name
deathStateName.hint: The description shown to players when the token is dead. Compendium tab has a macro for marking a token (or several) as dead.

deathMarker.name: Death Marker
deathMarker.hint:
Path to the condition icon that marks the dead tokens.
To get a custom icon's path, select a token marked with it, open the console and enter "canvas.tokens.controlled[0].data.overlayEffect"

NPCsJustDie.name: NPCs die immediately
NPCsJustDie.hint: The last stage of NPCs is replaced by the Death State Name.

perfectionism.name: Perfectionism
perfectionism.hint: Only show the best possible description when the target is in perfect state - not a single damage taken.

outputChat.name: Output Estimate to Chat
outputChat.hint: Output any estimate changes to chat. Characters flagged with the Hide Estimate macro will be shown as "Unknown Entity".

addTemp.name: Add Temporary Health
addTemp.hint:
Include temporary health points in calculating what description to show.
E.g. with the setting turned on the token receiving temp HP will look "healthier" unless it's already at max health.

breakOnZeroMaxHP.name: Hide on tokens with 0 max HP

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: Accepts any valid property for CSS font-size

useColor.name: Use Color
useColor.hint: This won't affect the settings window, but with checkmark off the descriptions will be shown in black and white.

smoothGradient.name: Smooth Gradient
smoothGradient.hint: With this setting off the color will only change when the next description is reached, with it on it will reflect the health percentage.

positionAdjustment.name: Position Adjustment
positionAdjustment.hint: Position is set relative to the frame. The number lets you tweak the position relative to its normal place. Positive numbers push it lower, negative â€“ higher. The default value of -1 sets it to "1 line above initial position".

vehicleNames.hint: Descriptions shown for vehicles if "Use Vehicle Threshold" is off

addNonlethal.name: Use Nonlethal Damage
addNonlethal.hint: If enabled nonlethal damage will be substracted from current health for estimation.

disabledName.name: Disabled
disabledName.hint: Description to show when token is precisely at 0 HP or has more nonlethal damage than HP remaining

dyingName.name: Dying
dyingName.hint: Description to show when token is below 0 HP

countPools.name: Count Empty Pools
countPools.hint: Count empty pools instead of sum of their values, with the estimation only changing when a pool is depleted/replenished

useThreshold.name: Use Vehicle Threshold
useThreshold.hint: If this setting is on, the "Threshold Stages" descriptions will be used for vehicles above threshold, below it, and at 0 HP respectively.

thresholdNames.name: Threshold Stages
thresholdNames.hint: The amount of stages is limited to 3, arranged from worst to best condition

vehicleNames.name: Vehicle Stages
vehicleNames.hint: Descriptions shown for starships (always), and vehicles (if "Use Vehicle Threshold" is off)

addStamina.name: Account for Stamina
addStamina.hint: With this setting on Stamina will be added to HP for calculations.

simpleRule.name: Estimation Rule
simpleRule.hint: The JS formula for calculating the fraction of health token has. Alter with caution. Default assumes simple descending health, e.g. you start with 10/10 in your health field and go down to 0/10 when taking damage.
simpleRule.default: const hp = token.actor.data.data.health; return hp.value / hp.max
